channel.title: How do I change my guys appearance?
channel.description: Im on 127.0.0.1 server (default), and how do i change my appearance like face and hair?

item.title: How do I change my guys appearance?
item.dc:creator: @123unknown321 123unknown321
item.description:
@123unknown321 wrote:

[quote author=Slain link=topic=32324.msg382079#msg382079 date=1162370587]
Certian servers have the ability to do this, you can mess around with your saved file of your charector and see how that goes =-)

heres mine

[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 8 character-look = 2 1 character-look = 3 2 character-look = 4 3 character-look = 5 7

Whitescape

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change my guys appearance?
